name: Not my Apples!
description:
It's Harvest time! Time to deliver those freshly picked apples, but there is something lurking in the farm. Something bouncy, and hungry for Apples!

Dodge those bouncy creatures while carrying the apples. Do not hesitate to bait them with some apples, Some profit is always better than no profit.

Made in less than 1 day for Ludum Dare 43
Didn't include sounds because I ran out of time and energy.

Started late because of earlier commitments.
